name: Bok Bok Beats
description:
Made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam 28. All sprites, music, sound effects, and code were made from scratch. Instructions are on the "help" page of the game. For best results, please download and play on your computer.

Note: while this game is available for HTML5, Windows, Mac, and Linux, I have only tested the Windows and HTML5 versions of the game.
